io.confluent.ksql.rest.server.services

Class ServerInternalKsqlClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.rest.server.services.ServerInternalKsqlClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimpleKsqlClient

    public class ServerInternalKsqlClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimpleKsqlClient
    A KSQL client implementation that sends requests to KsqlResource directly, rather than going over the network. Used by HealthCheckResource to bypass needing authentication credentials when submitting health check requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      • makeQueryRequest

        public RestResponse<java.lang.Integer> makeQueryRequest(java.net.URI serverEndpoint,
                                                        java.lang.String sql,
                                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> configOverrides,
                                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> requestProperties,
                                                        java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.List<StreamedRow>> rowConsumer)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleKsqlClient
        Send pull query request to remote Ksql server. This version of makeQueryRequest allows consuming the rows as they stream in rather than aggregating them all in one list. The method itself blocks until the query is complete.
        Specified by:
        makeQueryRequest in interface SimpleKsqlClient
        Parameters:
        serverEndpoint - the remote destination
        sql - the pull query statement
        configOverrides - the config overrides provided by the client
        requestProperties - the request metadata provided by the server
        rowConsumer - A consumer that's fed lists of rows as they stream in
        Returns:
        the number of rows returned by pull query

      • makeQueryRequestStreamed

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<RestResponse<BufferedPublisher<StreamedRow>>> makeQueryRequestStreamed(java.net.URI serverEndPoint,
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String sql,
                                                                                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> configOverrides,
                                                                                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> requestProperties)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleKsqlClient
        Send query request to remote Ksql server. This method is similar to SimpleKsqlClient.makeQueryRequest(URI, String, Map, Map, Consumer), but gives a different API. First, this is run asynchronously and second, when a response is received, a publisher is returned which publishes results asynchronously as they become available.
        Specified by:
        makeQueryRequestStreamed in interface SimpleKsqlClient
        Parameters:
        serverEndPoint - the remote destination
        sql - the pull query statement
        configOverrides - the config overrides provided by the client
        requestProperties - the request metadata provided by the server
        Returns:
        the future containing a publisher of StreamedRows.
